IN.IC: je pomožni glagol, ki ga nekateri štejejo za preteklik glagola
toda v tem slovarju ju obravnavamo ločeno.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
should happen
, se bo po mnenju govorca verjetno zgodilo.

seg.quote: We should be there by dinner time.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekaj
should happen
, hočemo povedati, da se nam zdi moralno prav.

seg.quote: These birds shouldn't be in a cage.

sense.def:
Besedo
should
uporabljamo v vprašanjih, s katerimi želimo dobiti nasvet, dovoljenje ali podatke.

seg.quote: Where should I meet you tonight?
Should I turn the light on?
If you have anything really confidential I should install a safe.
I shouldn't bother to copy these down.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
should have happened
, se ni zgodilo, čeprav so ljudje pričakovali, da se bo.

seg.quote: Muskie should have won by a huge margin.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekaj
should have happened by now
, hočemo povedati, da se je po našem mnenju že zgodilo do tega trenutka.

seg.quote: Dear Mom, you should have heard by now that I'm O.K.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo
I should think something is true
, hočemo povedati, da je nekaj res, nismo pa o tem prepričani.

seg.quote: I should think it was about twelve years ago.
He weighs, I should say, about 140 pounds.

sense.def:
Izraz
should
uporabljamo, kadar želimo na vljuden način povedati, da bi radi nekaj dobili ali naredili.

seg.quote: I should like a large cutlet, please.
I should like to say something about my new novel.

sense.def:
Izraz
should
se uporablja v predmetnih odvisnikih (stavkih, ki se začnejo z veznikom
that
) za določenimi glagoli in pridevniki.

seg.quote: It was arranged that Celia should come to Switzerland.
If we should be seen arriving together, they would get suspicious.
Should you have an accident, synthetic quilts are quite easy to wash.
